name: Arrowheads
description:
Small action game for two players. Enjoy!

Controls:

You can use either gamepads, or

P1: arrow keys + N,M

P2: ESDF + Q,W

This is my first pico-8 game!

If you have suggestions, please leave them in the comments.

Subscribe to my twitter account to find more of my stuff:

https://twitter.com/hunajive
